item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I have a YouTube channel where I speak about finance, economics, and geopolitics content. I am looking for a person who can do video editing on the videos that I record. The editing would be simple as I would want some audio, graphs, text, and slides added to the video that I record about a topic.  I would be recording the video at my home and would be sending it to the person for editing through the cloud. Additionally, I want the person to recommend strategies and work to help me grow my social media followers on YouTube and other social media accounts.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 29, 2024 22:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Management
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Management
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced YouTube video editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of YouTube video trends, audience preferences, and best practices for optimizing videos for the platform. You will be responsible for editing and enhancing our YouTube videos, ensuring high-quality visuals, smooth transitions, and engaging content. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work with tight deadlines are essential for this role.
    Skills:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong knowledge of YouTube video editing techniques
    - Ability to add captions, graphics, and other visual effects
    - Familiarity with video SEO best practices
    Size: Small
    Duration: Under 1 month
    Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 29, 2024 22:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Need someone to create faceless advertisements for some products, these will be in the women's supplement industry + a charger.  Looking for someone who can source the content and edit videos with an AI voiceover.

Here are some examples of videos I'd like:
- https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZPREf4GyY/
- https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZPREfVyPF/

The product will be different but I'd love a mix of images and videos with on screen text and an ai VoiceOver - all in all I just need these to be very engaging.

Please send any examples you have from past work.


Budget: $150
Posted On: June 29, 2024 22:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, TikTok Video, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, TikTok Video, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, Audio Editing

item.title: Youtube Agency Wanted - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

We are an international team looking for an experienced YouTube Agency to test a new channel. What are we looking for?

- Experience with YouTube
- Plagiarism-free content AND footage (will be checked!)
- Know how thumbnails work and is able to deliver quality
- Long-term commitment

Agency need:

- Script witer
- Voice Over (NO AI!)
- Video Editor
- Thumbnail designer

We will start with 4-5 min videos to test the niche. If positive, we are ready to scale to long-form content on a daily basis.

Please share your portfolio with me and your prices.
Budget will be around 250 dollars for 10 videos. Prices are negotiable.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 29, 2024 21:56 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Content Writing
Skills: Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Content Writing
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: We need a short assessment of the audio in our YouTube Shows. You don't have to understand Spanish. - Upwork
item.description:
Hi.
We are having bad comments about the audio in the shows we produce and upload to YouTube. We are looking for an expert to right us their comments about the audio, what problems do they see, where and the size of the problem.
We are not looking for someone to fix them, nor a list of recommendations, but if you want to give us some, the better.
We will give you a couple of links so you can watch and write a small report.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 29, 2024 21:50 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Audio Production, Video Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Audio Production, Video Production
Country: Chile
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor Position at Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Hi editors, hope you are doing great!

My name is Alvie and I run a content creation agency for online fitness coaches.

We specialize in creating and editing engaging reels/shorts for coaches, including talking head videos with captions and effects, as well as short text on the screen reels.

We're looking for an editor to come in and work on all of our clients' content: talking head videos, text on the screen videos, motivational videos etc.

This is a long term project and we are excited to partner with a dedicated editor on our team.

Thanks a lot, looking forward to reading your proposals!
Alvie

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 21:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor For YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! We are a YouTube Automation company and we are looking for a talented, hard-working, and experienced Video-Editor to join our team.

We are looking for MULTIPLE people experienced in editing videos for:
Cars/Trucks, a similar channel to these:
https://www.youtube.com/@infodrivetv/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@top.intel0

We are looking for a long-term collaboration, on a project basis in the beginning, and
eventually, if we are a good fit we would also have the full-time/retainer opportunity.
Please do not apply if you do not have any experience.
Looking forward to working with you!
Anthony

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 29, 2024 21:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Education, Video Intro & Outro, YouTube Development

item.title: Video Editor Who Can Add Caption To a 60 Second Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor who can accurately add captions to a 60-second video. The ideal candidate must be able to place captions in the correct locations, ensuring they do not obstruct any important visual elements on the screen. This project is straightforward and requires immediate attention, so please only apply if you can start right away.

Responsibilities:

Add accurate captions to a 60-second video.
Ensure captions are placed correctly and do not block any visual content.
Utilize a style where captions appear as 1-2 words on screen at a time.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, specifically with captioning.
Attention to detail to ensure captions are placed correctly.
Ability to work quickly and efficiently to meet tight deadlines.
Availability to start the project immediately.


**Deliverable is 1 video with the added captions. There is no other editing required

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 29, 2024 21:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
